page.title: 07Freeman's Woodyard.
page.content: Freeman's are the biggest employers in the district and have about 57 people on their books.They also employ a lot of sub-contract labour. They have all the skills needed to build a complete house,like bricklayers,carpenters,plumbers,electr icians,plasterers and decorators. They used to have other skills at Freemans ,tyey had craftsmen like wheelwrights,blacksmiths,coachpainters and saw sharpeners. They also had a complete undertakers business.They made the coffins and laid out the bodies.They had to stop when they were told they had to have a chapel of rest.
